intro: Tricalysia zambesiaca, commonly known as the Zambesi flame tree, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. The plant belongs to the family Bignoniaceae and is known for its rapid growth and adaptability to various soil types. Tricalysia zambesiaca is often cultivated as an ornamental tree due to its vibrant floral display and ability to thrive in tropical and subtropical climates.
